Uses of Crossover in org.epochx.core
 

Methods in org.epochx.core that return Crossover
 Crossover Model.getCrossover()
          Retrieves the operator that is currently set to perform the genetic operation of crossover.
 

Methods in org.epochx.core with parameters of type Crossover
 void Model.setCrossover(Crossover crossover)
          Specifies the operator to perform the crossover operation.
 

Uses of Crossover in org.epochx.ge.op.crossover
 

Subinterfaces of Crossover in org.epochx.ge.op.crossover
 interface GECrossover
          This interface defines the structure which specific crossover operations can implement to provide different methods of crossing over two CandidatePrograms.
 

Classes in org.epochx.ge.op.crossover that implement Crossover
 class FixedPointCrossover
          This class implements a fixed point crossover on two CandidatePrograms.
 class OnePointCrossover
          This class implements a one point crossover on two CandidatePrograms.
 

Uses of Crossover in org.epochx.gp.op.crossover
 

Subinterfaces of Crossover in org.epochx.gp.op.crossover
 interface GPCrossover
          This interface defines the structure which specific crossover operations can implement to provide different methods of crossing over two CandidatePrograms.
 

Classes in org.epochx.gp.op.crossover that implement Crossover
 class KozaCrossover
          This class implements a Koza style crossover operation on two CandidatePrograms.
 class UniformPointCrossover
          This class implements standard crossover with uniform swap points.
